sources.title: Maid's Night Out
sources.description: Title: Maid's Night Out Summary: A millionaire's son works as a milkman for a month to win a bet with his father. While delivering milk he falls in love with a young debutante whom he mistakes for a maid. Directed by: Ben Holmes Actors: Joan Fontaine, Allan Lane, Billy Gilbert Production Company: RKO Radio Pictures Release Date: 4 March 1938 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A millionaire's son works as a milkman for a month to win a bet with his father. While delivering milk he falls in love with a young debutante whom he mistakes for a maid.

metadata.Plot: A millionaire's son works as a milkman for a month to win a bet with his father. While delivering milk he falls in love with a young debutante whom he mistakes for a maid.
